statements: UPDATE user_authentication SET password_hash = 'new_password_hash', last_login = '2021-10-25 09:00:00' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE financial_data SET balance = balance + 1000.00, last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE account_number = '123456789' AND user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE login_attempts SET login_timestamp = current_timestamp WHERE user_id = '22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222';
UPDATE users SET password = 'newpassword123' WHERE username = 'john_doe';

UPDATE access_logs SET action = 'Login Successful', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE username = 'jane_smith');
